backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, app settings, sermon caching, and app release management with role-based access control using MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting responsive design implementations across location modals, layouts, typography, buttons, and spacing with high confidence mappings to test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including global styles, location services, prayer times, weather API integration, settings persistence, and responsive UI components with Tailwind breakpoints.
frontend/docs/android-webview-template.m: Complete Android Studio template guide for wrapping the web app in a native Android WebView with JavaScript bridge, notifications, AlarmManager integration, and Play Store version checking.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light/dark theme variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter font from Google Fonts, app icon, and android-widget-bridge.js script before the main React application bundle.
frontend/public/android-widget-bridge.js: Standalone JavaScript bridge providing global functions (updateNextPrayerWidget, updateDailyPrayersWidget, updateWeeklyPrayersWidget) and AndroidPrayer interface for Android WebView widget updates via SharedPreferences.
frontend/src/androidPushBridge.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for AndroidPush interface that bridges WebView to native Android for sending prayer times data (next prayer, daily/weekly schedules with timestamps) to SharedPreferences, alarm scheduler, and widgets.
frontend/src/androidWidgetBridge.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for Android widget bridge global functions that update native Android widgets with prayer times (next prayer, daily prayers, weekly prayers) using HH:MM time strings and timestamps.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and manages tab navigation between 16+ feature tabs (home, prayer times, weather, settings, Quran reading, etc.). Loads saved location from localStorage on mount and renders mobile tab navigation with Islamic-themed gradient backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Empty authentication button component that returns null (placeholder or disabled feature).
frontend/src/components/HeaderFlourish.t: Decorative header component that displays an Islamic divider flourish image with responsive sizing and opacity, hidden on mobile screens.
frontend/src/components/MobileTabsNav.ts: Mobile-optimized tab navigation component with 5 primary tabs (home, Esmaül Hüsna, Zikirmatik, Ramazan, overflow menu) and an overflow menu for 12 additional tabs, featuring Islamic pattern backgrounds and responsive sizing.
frontend/src/components/SelectLocationPr: Card component prompting users to select a location before viewing prayer times and weather, with a navigation button to the location settings.
frontend/src/components/TabsOverflowMenu: Dropdown menu component for overflow tabs (Quran reading, prayer tracker, fasting tracker, nearby mosques, religious days, qibla finder, etc.) with icons and Islamic ornamental accents.
Defines TypeScript interfaces and data arrays for morning and evening adhkar (Islamic remembrances), including Arabic text, transliterations, translations in Turkish, and repetition counts.
frontend/src/features/adhkar/MorningEven: Tab component for morning and evening adhkar (Islamic remembrances) with checkboxes to track completion, displaying Arabic text, transliteration, and translations with reset functionality using app settings storage.
frontend/src/features/app-release/curren: Exports a constant string for the current app version ("1.0.0") using semantic versioning, intended to be manually updated before each release.
frontend/src/features/app-release/semver: Provides semantic version comparison utilities that parse and compare version strings (e.g., "1.2.3") numerically, with fallback to string comparison on parse errors.
frontend/src/features/app-release/Update: React component that displays a dismissible alert when a newer app version is available, comparing backend version with current version and opening Play Store URL on update.
frontend/src/features/app-release/update: LocalStorage utilities for persisting and retrieving the dismissed app update version, preventing repeated prompts for the same version.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useIsC: React Query hook that checks if the current user is an admin by calling the backend actor's isCallerAdmin method, returning false by default on errors.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useLat: React Query hook that fetches the latest app release metadata from the backend actor, returning null gracefully if unavailable or on error.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useUpd: React Query mutation hook for updating app release metadata (admin-only), invalidating the latest release query on success to refresh UI.
frontend/src/features/dua-guide/duaGuide: Defines TypeScript types and data for dua categories (travel, healing, abundance, etc.) and their associated supplications with Arabic text, transliterations, and Turkish translations.
frontend/src/features/dua-guide/DuaGuide: React component displaying categorized Islamic duas (supplications) with tabs for categories, a scrollable list, and a dialog showing full Arabic text, transliteration, and Turkish translation.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: React card component displaying one of the 99 Names of Allah with Arabic text, transliteration, numbered badge, gradient background, and click handler for viewing details.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/esmaul: Defines the data structure and array for Esmaül Hüsna items, containing 99 entries with Arabic names, transliterations, Turkish meanings, and prayers (content truncated in source).
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Displays a grid of Allah's 99 names (Esmaül Hüsna) with clickable cards that open a dialog showing detailed information including Arabic text, transliteration, Turkish meaning, and associated prayer.
frontend/src/features/fasting-tracker/Fa: Manages fasting tracking including voluntary fasts, make-up fasts with target counts, and Ramadan day-by-day status tracking with add/remove functionality and date validation.
frontend/src/features/fasting-tracker/Ra: Renders a 30-day Ramadan fasting checklist with progress bar, day-by-day status toggles (Fasted/Missed), and a reset dialog to clear all tracking data.
frontend/src/features/hatim/HatimTakipTa: Tracks Quran reading progress (Hatim) with page counter (1-604), increment/decrement buttons, manual page input, progress bar, and reset functionality that persists to app settings.
frontend/src/features/home/currentPrayer: Utility that determines the current prayer time slot (fajr, sunrise, dhuhr, asr, maghrib, isha) based on adjusted prayer times and current time.
frontend/src/features/home/formatRemaini: Formats milliseconds into zero-padded countdown strings: mm:ss for under 1 hour, HH:mm:ss for 1+ hours, clamping negatives to zero.
frontend/src/features/home/HomeTab.tsx: Main home screen displaying prayer times, weather, location selector, next prayer countdown, weekly prayer times, and Sahur/Iftar information with offset adjustments and Android widget integration.
frontend/src/features/home/MotifButton.t: A button component that wraps the base Button with a subtle Islamic tile pattern overlay background for decorative purposes.
frontend/src/features/home/MotifFrame.ts: A decorative frame component with three variants: default (plain), ornamental (corner decorations), and divider (bottom flourish), using Islamic pattern images.
frontend/src/features/home/NextPrayerCou: Presentational component displaying the next prayer name, time, and countdown in mm:ss or HH:mm:ss format, receiving computed data from parent to avoid duplicate bridge calls.
frontend/src/features/home/PrayerTimeCar: Displays four prayer-time-specific cards (verse, hadith, dua, esma) with icons and gradients, opening a dialog with full content when clicked, using current prayer slot to determine content.
frontend/src/features/home/SahurIftarStr: A horizontal strip showing sahur (fajr) and iftar (maghrib) times with a countdown to the next event, designed for Ramadan fasting schedule display.
frontend/src/features/home/time-content/: Static data array of 20+ Islamic duas with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and occasion labels for display in prayer time cards.
Defines HadithItem interface and exports an array of 30+ hadiths with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and source references (Buhari, Müslim, etc.).
Defines VerseItem interface and exports an array of 24+ Quranic verses with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and Surah:Ayah references.
frontend/src/features/home/useAndroidPus: React hook that sends comprehensive prayer time data (next prayer, daily/weekly schedules with timestamps) to AndroidPush interface, deduplicating updates by comparing JSON payloads.
frontend/src/features/home/useAndroidWid: React hook that sends daily and weekly prayer times to Android widgets via both legacy and new bridge interfaces, deduplicating updates to prevent unnecessary calls.
frontend/src/features/home/useCurrentPra: React hook that tracks the current prayer time slot (fajr, sunrise, dhuhr, asr, maghrib, isha) and updates every minute when the slot changes.
frontend/src/features/home/useNextPrayer: React hook that computes the next prayer with live per-second countdown, exposes nextPrayerMillis and formatted timeRemaining, and sends updates to Android bridge only when prayer changes.
frontend/src/features/home/usePrayerTime: React hook that selects random verse, hadith, dua, and Esma-ul Husna content for display cards, using the current prayer slot as a seed for stable randomization within each slot.
frontend/src/features/home/useSahurIftar: React hook that calculates and returns countdown information for sahur (fajr) and iftar (maghrib) times, updating every minute to show time remaining until the next prayer event.
frontend/src/features/home/WeeklyPrayerT: Displays a weekly prayer times table with sticky first column, highlighting today's row, showing all six prayer times (imsak, sunrise, dhuhr, asr, maghrib, isha) for seven days.
frontend/src/features/location/LocationS: React component providing a location search interface using geocoding, allowing users to search for and save locations with persistence to both localStorage and app settings.
frontend/src/features/location/openMeteo: Utility module that fetches location data from Open-Meteo Geocoding API and transforms geocoding results into Location objects with formatted display names.
frontend/src/features/location/types.ts: TypeScript type definitions for Location (with display name and coordinates) and GeocodingResult (with additional administrative region fields).
frontend/src/features/location/useGeocod: React Query hook that performs geocoding searches with debouncing (minimum 2 characters), caching results for 5 minutes.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/Nam: React component displaying Islamic prayer tutorial with gender-specific instructions, showing daily prayer rakat counts and step-by-step prayer guidance with Arabic text.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/nam: Content data defining prayer rakat counts for five daily prayers and detailed step-by-step prayer instructions for both men and women following Hanafi tradition in Turkey.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/dista: Utility functions for calculating great-circle distance between coordinates using Haversine formula and formatting distances for display (meters/kilometers).
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/Nearb: React component for searching and selecting locations specifically for nearby mosque searches, with options to use temporarily or save as default location.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/nearb: API client that queries OpenStreetMap via Overpass API to fetch nearby mosques (place_of_worship with religion=muslim), calculates distances, and sorts results.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/Nearb: React component that displays nearby mosques based on user location, with location search, temporary location selection, and integration with Google Maps for navigation.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/types: TypeScript interface definition for NearbyMosque with id, name, coordinates, distance, and optional address.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/useNe: React Query hook for fetching nearby mosques with caching, enabled only when coordinates are provided, with 5-minute stale time.
frontend/src/features/notifications/noti: Centralized notification text templates for prayer times (fajr, dhuhr, asr, maghrib, isha, sunrise) with formatting utilities for time and lead minutes.
frontend/src/features/prayer-tracker/Pra: React component for tracking daily prayers with checkboxes and managing kaza (missed prayer) counters with increment/decrement controls and manual input.
API client for fetching daily prayer times from Aladhan API using method 13, returning times for fajr, sunrise, dhuhr, asr, maghrib, and isha.
frontend/src/features/prayer/aladhanWeek: API client for fetching 7-day prayer times from Aladhan API with formatted day labels in Turkish locale.
frontend/src/features/prayer/kerahatTime: Computes three Islamic kerahat (prohibited prayer) time windows based on sunrise, dhuhr, and maghrib times, and merges them with prayer times into a chronologically sorted list.
frontend/src/features/prayer/PrayerTimes: React component displaying prayer times with offset adjustment, kerahat (forbidden) time windows, and location prompt if no location is set.
Applies minute offsets to prayer times with 24-hour wraparound, supporting single times, daily prayer sets, and weekly prayer time arrays.
frontend/src/features/prayer/usePrayerTi: React Query hook that fetches daily prayer times for a given location with 30-minute cache and retry logic.
frontend/src/features/prayer/useWeeklyPr: React Query hook that fetches weekly prayer times for a given location with 30-minute cache and single retry.
frontend/src/features/qibla/QiblaFinderT: React component that displays a Qibla compass using device orientation and location, with permission handling and visual compass UI showing direction to Kaaba.
frontend/src/features/qibla/qiblaMath.ts: Calculates the great-circle bearing from any geographic coordinate to the Kaaba in Mecca using spherical trigonometry.
frontend/src/features/qibla/useDeviceOri: React hook that accesses device compass heading via DeviceOrientationEvent API with iOS 13+ permission handling.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/qura: Frontend API client for Al-Quran Cloud that fetches surah metadata, Arabic text, Turkish translations, and audio recitation URLs with in-memory caching.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/Qura: React component providing a Quran reader interface with surah list, Arabic text, Turkish translation toggle, audio playback controls, and persistent reading position.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/useA: Custom React hook that manages audio playback for Quran ayahs, providing play/pause controls, navigation between ayahs, auto-play functionality, and state tracking (loading, error, time, duration).
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/useQ: Hook that manages and persists Quran reading state (last surah/ayah numbers and scroll position) using app settings.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/fastingBas: Static content data defining fasting basics sections covering what fasting is, who must fast, how to fast, what breaks the fast, and recommended/prohibited behaviors.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/ramadanMen: Data file containing 30 daily Ramadan menu suggestions with sahur and iftar meal plans for each day.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/RamazanKos: React component displaying Ramadan corner tab with prayer times (imsak/iftar), daily rotating menu, fasting basics, taravih information, and location setup dialog.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/tarawihCon: Static content data describing taravih prayer details including number of rakats, how to perform it, and notes about Ramadan observance.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/useDailyRo: Hook that returns a daily rotating Ramadan menu based on day of year, automatically updating at midnight using timeouts and intervals.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/dat: Utility functions for local timezone date operations including start-of-day calculation, days-between computation, and Turkish locale date formatting.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/hij: Converts Hijri calendar events to Gregorian dates for a given year by scanning each day and using the browser's Intl API with Islamic calendar support.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/rel: Contains a hardcoded dataset of 15 Islamic religious days for 2026 with Turkish names, Gregorian dates, and corresponding Hijri month/day values.
Defines TypeScript interfaces for Hijri events (with month/day) and computed religious days (with Gregorian date and display information).
frontend/src/features/religious-days/Rel: Component displaying 2026 Islamic religious days in a list with highlighted next upcoming event and countdown in Turkish.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/use: React hook that returns the fixed 2026 religious days list, identifies the next upcoming event, and calculates days remaining until it.
frontend/src/features/settings/AdminAppR: Admin-only React component for managing app release metadata (version and Play Store URL) with form inputs, validation, and success/error messaging.
frontend/src/features/settings/appSettin: Defines TypeScript types for app settings including location, prayer times, notifications, fasting tracking, prayer checklists, Quran progress, and Ramadan status.
frontend/src/features/settings/durableLo: Provides IndexedDB-based persistent storage functions for saving, retrieving, and clearing user location data with error handling.
frontend/src/features/settings/localSett: Manages localStorage and IndexedDB persistence for app settings including location, prayer times, notifications, fasting, adhkar, Quran progress, and prayer tracking with migration support.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsT: React component providing UI for general app settings including prayer time offset adjustment and per-prayer notification lead time configuration.
frontend/src/features/settings/useAppSet: React hook that manages app settings using React Query, providing methods to load/save settings from local storage with default values for prayer times, notifications, Quran progress, fasting, and other Islamic app features.
frontend/src/features/tasbihat/tasbihatD: Data file defining the structure and content of tasbihat items including Subhanallah, Alhamdulillah, Allahu Akbar, Kelime-i Tevhid, and Ayetel Kursi with Arabic text, transliterations, and translations.
frontend/src/features/tasbihat/TasbihatT: React component displaying post-prayer tasbihat (glorifications) in a scrollable card list, showing Arabic text, transliteration, translation, and repetition count for each phrase.
frontend/src/features/weather/CompactWea: Compact weather display component showing temperature and weather description with a cloud icon, conditionally rendered only when location is set.
frontend/src/features/weather/openMeteoW: API client for fetching weather data from Open-Meteo service and utility function to convert weather codes to Turkish descriptions.
frontend/src/features/weather/useWeather: React Query hook for fetching and caching weather data based on location coordinates with 10-minute stale time.
frontend/src/features/weather/WeatherSec: Full weather section card component displaying temperature, weather description, wind speed, and humidity, with location prompt if no location is configured.
frontend/src/features/zikirmatik/Zikirma: Digital tasbih (dhikr counter) component with increment/reset buttons, customizable target, progress bar, and persistent state saved to app settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, automatically recreating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and providing login/logout functionality with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, including color palettes for UI elements and prayer times, plus responsive typography utilities and safe area inset handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/utils/androidBridge.ts: Provides safe wrapper functions for calling Android WebView bridge methods to send prayer time data to native Android layer for widgets and notifications, with graceful fallback for web browsers.
frontend/src/utils/nativeNotifications.t: Utility for triggering native Android notifications via WebView JavaScript bridge with prayer-specific and generic notification helpers, including environment detection and app version retrieval.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter parsing utilities that work with both query strings and hash-based routing, including sessionStorage persistence for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining responsive breakpoints, custom color system using OKLCH, container settings, typography, and animation utilities for the application.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document showing in-progress responsive design implementation across the application, with focus on mobile optimization and location picker modal fixes.
